title: ICE: Type parameter out of range when substituting in region 'a

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
struct A;

pub trait B<'a> {
    fn is(&'a self, other: &'a B<'a>) -> bool {
        self.get_a() as *const A == other.get_a() as *const A
    }

    fn get_a<'b, 'a: 'b>(&'a self) -> &'b A;
}

fn main() {}
```

